mcpServers._comment: MCP servers must be installed using 'claude mcp add' commands

playwright.windows: claude mcp add playwright -- cmd /c npx '@playwright/mcp@latest'

brave-search.unix: claude mcp add brave-search --env BRAVE_API_KEY=YOUR_KEY -- npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search
brave-search.windows: claude mcp add brave-search --env BRAVE_API_KEY=YOUR_KEY -- cmd /c npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search

obsidian.setup: Install Obsidian plugin from Community Plugins, enable HTTP server
obsidian.connect: Run Obsidian desktop, then in Claude Code use /ide to connect

mcpServers._note: This file is for reference only. Actual MCP configuration is managed by Claude Code CLI.
